mapper.select: select a.shopId ,a.shopname as shopName,a.areaname as floorName,a.doorname as doorName,a.doorid as doorId, nvl(a.incount,0) as incount,nvl(b.incount,0) as incountCom from (select b.shopId,b.shopname,a.areaname,a.doorname,a.doorid,nvl(sum(case a.starthr when '09' then (a.incount * 0.5) when '22' then (a.incount * 0.5) else a.incount end),0) as incount from KL_floor_counter_HOURS a,lp_bi_shop b WHERE b.shopid IN (${shopId}) and a.mdate >= #{startTime} and a.mdate <= #{endTime} and a.areatypeid = 7 and a.shopid = b.kl_mcid AND a.starthr >= '09' AND a.starthr <= '22' group by b.shopId,b.shopname,a.areaname,a.doorname,a.doorid) a LEFT JOIN (select b.shopId,b.shopname,a.areaname,a.doorname,a.doorid,nvl(sum(case a.starthr when '09' then (a.incount * 0.5) when '22' then (a.incount * 0.5) else a.incount end),0) as incount from KL_floor_counter_HOURS a,lp_bi_shop b WHERE b.shopid IN (${shopId}) and mdate >= #{startTimeCom} and a.mdate <= #{endTimeCom} and a.areatypeid = 7 and a.shopid = b.kl_mcid AND a.starthr >= '09' AND a.starthr <= '22' group by b.shopId,b.shopname,a.areaname,a.doorname,a.doorid) b ON a.shopId = b.shopId and a.doorid = b.doorid order by a.shopId,a.areaname,a.doorid
